root.name: Nemesis 3: The Eve of Destruction
root.description: Nemesis 3: The Eve of Destruction (Gofer no Yabou Episode II in Japan) is a side-scrolling shooter released exclusively for MSX in 1988, and in 2010 for Wii Virtual Console in Japan. It is a direct successor to MSX versions of Nemesis, Nemesis 2 and Salamander, and is not related to arcade game Gradius III, which is available for several platforms.
